Then assign each letter of the alphabet a number (A:1, B:2, etc.). Give your child a word and have him use the code to write it in numbers. Finally, challenge him to look in the dictionary for the seven-letter word with the highest product he can find. https://bit.ly/2WowLKq

Let your child take control and move the hands to the correct time. https://bit.ly/2W0yjeJ
